resources.name: Confirmations
resources.explanation:
User confirmation API.

Provides the ability to confirm user.

resources.name: Courses
resources.explanation:
El Plano courses API.

Course attributes :

 - `title` - Represents course name(human readable identity).
 - `timestamps`

 Also, includes reference to the course lecturer.

examples.description: INDEX : Retrieve courses created by authenticated user
SHOW : Retrieve information about requested course

resources.name: Events
resources.explanation:
El Plano events API.

Event attributes :

 - `title` - Represents event name.
 - `description` - Represents event detailed description.
 - `status` - Represents event current status.
   - `confirmed` - The event is confirmed. This is the default status.
   - `tentative` - The event is tentatively confirmed.
   - `cancelled` - The event is cancelled (deleted).

 - `recurrence` - Represents recurrence rules.
 - `timezone` - Timezone settings.
 - `start_at` - Represents when event starts.
 - `end_at` - Represents when event ends.
 - `timestamps`

 Also, includes reference to the event creator and attached course.

examples.description: INDEX : Retrieve events created by authenticated user
SHOW : Retrieve information about requested event

resources.name: Group members
resources.explanation:
El Plano group members API.

Student attributes :

  - `full_name` - Represents concatenated student's first, last and middle names.
  - `email` - Represents email which is used to contact with the student.
  - `phone` - Represents phone which is used to contact with the student.
  - `about` - Represents some detailed information about student(BIO).
  - `social_networks` - Represents a list of social networks.
  - `president` - `true` if the user has the right to administer the group, otherwise `false`(regular group member).
  - timestamps

  Also, includes information about a user and relationships to the group and user.

  - `email` - Represents email that was used to register a user in the application(unique in application scope).
  - `username` - Used as user name.
  - `admin` - `false` if regular user `true`, if the user has access to application settings.
  - `confirmed` - `false` if the user did not confirm his address otherwise `true`.
  - `avatar_url` - User's avatar URL.
  - `timestamps`

examples.description: SHOW : Show information about particular group member

resources.name: Group's Invites
resources.explanation:
El Plano group's invites API.

Invite attributes :

- `email` - Represents email where invite was sent.
- `invitation_token` - Represents token.
- `status` - Represents invite current status.
  - `accepted` - The invite was accepted by the recipient.
  - `pending` - The invite was not accepted by the recipient. Default status.
- `sent_at` - Date and time when the invite was sent.
- `accepted_at` - Date and time when the invite was accepted by recipient.
- `timestamps`

Also, includes reference to the sender, recipient.

examples.description: SHOW : Retrieve information about requested invite

resources.name: Groups
resources.explanation:
El Plano groups API'.

Group attributes: 

  - `title` - Human readable group identity.
  - `number` - Main group identity.
  - `timestamps`

  Also, returns information about group members in relationships.

examples.description: SHOW : Retrieve information about user's group

resources.name: Lecturers
resources.explanation:
El Plano lecturers API.

Course attributes :

 - `first_name`
 - `last_name`
 - `patronymic`
 - `timestamps`

 Also, includes reference to the courses.

examples.description: INDEX : Retrieve lecturers created by authenticated user
SHOW : Retrieve information about requested lecturer

resources.name: Passwords
resources.explanation:
User password reset API.

Provides the ability to change the password.

resources.name: Registrations
resources.explanation:
User registration API.

Users attributes :

  - `email` - Represents email that was used to register a user in the application(unique in application scope).
  - `username` - Used as user name.
  - `admin` - `false` if regular user `true`, if the user has access to application settings.
  - `confirmed` - `false` if the user did not confirm his address otherwise `true`.
  - timestamps

resources.name: Students
resources.explanation:
El Plano student's profile API.

Student attributes :

  - `full_name` - Represents concatenated student's first, last and middle names.
  - `email` - Represents email which is used to contact with the student.
  - `phone` - Represents phone which is used to contact with the student.
  - `about` - Represents some detailed information about student(BIO).
  - `social_networks` - Represents a list of social networks.
  - `president` - `true` if the user has the right to administer the group, otherwise `false`(regular group member).
  - timestamps

  Also, includes information about a group.

  - `title` - Represents group human readable identity.
  - `number` - Represents group main identity.
  - `timestamps`

resources.name: Unlocks
resources.explanation:
User unlock API.

Provides the ability to unlock user.

resources.name: User's Invites
resources.explanation:
El Plano user's invites API.

Invite attributes :

- `email` - Represents email where invite was sent.
- `invitation_token` - Represents token.
- `status` - Represents invite current status.
  - `accepted` - The invite was accepted by the recipient.
  - `pending` - The invite was not accepted by the recipient. Default status.
- `sent_at` - Date and time when the invite was sent.
- `accepted_at` - Date and time when the invite was accepted by recipient.
- `timestamps`

Also, includes reference to the sender, recipient.

examples.description: INDEX : Retrieve invites for authenticated user
SHOW : Retrieve information about requested invite

resources.name: Users
resources.explanation:
El Plano user's profile API.

Users attributes :

  - `email` - Represents email that was used to register a user in the application(unique in application scope).
  - `username` - Used as user name.
  - `admin` - `false` if regular user `true`, if the user has access to application settings.
  - `confirmed` - `false` if the user did not confirm his address otherwise `true`.
  - `timestamps`
